summary: This is an email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend informational meetings in New York or Florida to learn about available victim services. The email provides meeting dates, locations, and RSVP instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to the FBI briefing.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - Florida
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division holds a meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in Miramar, FL to inform them about available services.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division holds a meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York, NY to inform them about available services.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019.
Two informational meetings were scheduled for victims in October 2019, one in Florida and one in New York.
The FBI case number referenced is NY-3027571.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the meetings.
The email indicates the investigation was active at the time.
